lesserOrAlternativeOffence.offenceLegislation: Contrary to Byelaws 3(10) and 2(3) of the Gatwick Airport - London Byelaws 1996 and sections 63 and 64 of the Airports Act 1986.
lesserOrAlternativeOffence.offenceTitle: Allow a vehicle / an animal to be on Gatwick Airport after being forbidden to do so by a PC / airport official

verdictType.category: Guilty but of lesser offence by jury
